channel.title: Mtp v.2 a couple problems i cannot fix:/
channel.description:
1. when you die, claws and chaotic weapons disappear. ive already tried to delete them from the item_droppible or whatever but they still just disappear, any suggestions?
2.barrows isnt working correctly i can kill all the brothers but one, when i click on the coffin it just brings me to the chest and the torags brothere never spawns.
3.ive tried and tried so much and i cant get the npc's to drop, i read somewhere that marcbobs mtp v.2 doesn't have drops coded into the npc's or something. so i really need some help with that because without npc drops the server is kinda shit.
pleas do not flame i have searched and i have probably already posted one of these questions but i cant fix them and ive been working on these problems for like 4 days and cant get it.
if you can help me it would be greatly appreciated :)
cjdean1243@hotmail.com if you wana add me on msn if not its cool just post a reply here.

item.title: Mtp v.2 a couple problems i cannot fix:/
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

can anybody help me with this???

i erased all the drops in npcdrops.tsm and just added the gurad drops in fallador so i can just test everything with them but i got this error in the server cmd

java.util.NoSuchElementException: No line found at java.util.Scanner.nextLine(Unknown Source) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.loadDrops(NPCDrops.java:37) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init>(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:68) [10/22/10 5:53 PM]: Launching MTP... [10/22/10 5:53 PM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594 [10/22/10 5:54 PM]: [REGISTERED]: Cj
